The three trial models DoseFinderHub aims to explore are 3+3 design, Continual Reassessment Method (CRM), and Bayesian Optimal Interval (BOIN). Each model has its own strengths and weaknesses, and the choice of model can significantly impact the trial's outcomes. 

<div style="text-align: center;">
<u><h5 id="models_a">Model A: 3+3</h5></u>
</div>

- The classic rule-based dose escalation method.

<div style="text-align: center;">
<u><h5 id="models_b">Model B: CRM</h5></u>
</div>



- Model-based design using Bayesian statistics.
<div style="text-align: center;">
<u><h5 id="models_c">Model C: Bayesian Optimal Interval (BOIN)</h5></u>
</div>

  
- Interval-based design for flexible, adaptive trials.
